Re: International Sex Trafficking by Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell

Commissioner= 
I write on behalf of my client — 
I sent you a letter on 
May 4, 
2015 (and an amended letter a few days later). I received your response on May 11, 
2015, indicating that you would look into matter 
and be back in touch in due course. 
Having not heard back from you, I  wanted to follow
investigation is proceeding. And I wanted to

possible in your investigation.

made against Mr. Epstein 
and 
Ms Maxwell. 
We can confirm we arc 
progressing the matter and hope to 
provide you with a more detailed 
response in September. 
In the meantime, can 
you please provide written 
signed confirmation from 
that

ould
